trans_title: 巴西： 自然的历史 第一季
introduction: Brazil is a land of gigantic proportions. Energetic, flamboyant and fun, Brazil is also overwhelmingly beautiful. Within its mountains, seas, rainforests, deserts and millions of miles of rivers, are many of our planet’s last wild frontiers. Its diversity of life and landscape is second to none.In each episode, the viewer will be taken on a journey across fabulous landscapes a...
chinese_title: 巴西： 自然的历史 第一季
